item.title: Visualizing the flights data from the satRday Visualizaiton Challenge
item.author: map[username:daniel.berecz host:gmail.com] (Dániel Berecz)
item.description: The first satRday was held in Budapest the last year. There was a Visualization Challenge and I decided to participate on it. Unfortunatelly, because of technical difficulties, I couldn’t send my work in before the deadline, but I often come back to this data set, for testing out new things like this blog. Setup I started to get into R around the satRday, and I learned a lot since then, so I decided I update the a code a bit.

item.title: About
item.author: map[host:gmail.com username:daniel.berecz] (Dániel Berecz)
item.description: About the site This will be a blog. Setup This was built with Hugo. I used a modified version of the Minimo theme.

item.title: satRday
item.author: map[username:daniel.berecz host:gmail.com] (Dániel Berecz)
item.description: Test. x <- c(0, 2, 4, 8) Math \(f(x) = x\) test. And more math test: \[ f(x) = \int_0^1 g(x) \, \text{dx} \]
